text: Hello! I've analyzed your document about climate change. How can I help you understand it better?
What are the main causes of climate change according to the document?

The document identifies the primary causes as human activities that release greenhouse gases into the atmosphere. This includes the burning of fossil fuels for energy, deforestation, and certain industrial processes. (Source: Page 5) [1]
What are the projected impacts on global sea levels?

The document projects a significant rise in global sea levels due to thermal expansion of water and the melting of polar ice caps. It cites models that forecast a rise of 0.5 to 1.5 meters by the end of the century. (Source: Page 12) [2]
